3: After accidentally becoming Qu's 'partner' on the Nighter, she takes you to Kowloong's gate.
Now that you're my partner, understanding what's so great about Kowloong is priority number one.

2: I already know them as the enemy.

3: Really? Well, I'm sure there is a place in the city that you've never been to.
Halt! Who goes there?! You can't just come and go as you please. You need a pass to enter the city...
Ignoring the guard Construct, Qu walks straight up to the city wall...
This must have been unforeseen for the guard, and he does not manage to react in time to stop her.
Accessing highest authorization—Imperial Level. Opening door...
Qu raises her hands with impressive force, but the gate does not budge an inch.
How dare they override my authority! Open the gate!
Hey... Aren't you the commandant from Babylonia? Is she one of your squad mates? Looks like her head ain't on too tight.
Since Qu was using the Female Construct, no one can tell that she is actually the Kowloong Supreme.
Guard! I warned you to check the security and integrity of the city wall every day!
Roger! Eh?
Why hasn't this door's authorization system been fixed already?!
It was working this morning...
Well, then how come even I can't open it now?
Well, maybe it's because Huaxu was kidnapped, so the authorization system has reset. We don't know how to fix it either... Wait, why am I telling you all of this?
You seem to lack the proper etiquette when addressing the Kowloong Supreme. I order you on highest authority to open the city gate.
Kowloong Supreme...? Highest authority...?
Seeing Qu divulge her true identity so carelessly, you pull her aside and proceed to deal with the guard yourself.
What's the meaning of this? Do you wish to enter Kowloong...? Are you on a mission?
Then why didn't you apply for a pass beforehand? Speak...

2: Because we're on an urgent mission.

3: Well, seeing as your only team member is this brain-dead Construct here, it sure must be urgent...
The guard let out a sigh, then opens the gate.
Very well... Considering your contributions made to the metropolis, I'll take your word for it.
But you need to register first... Hey! What makes you think you can just waltz on in!
Qu walks into the metropolis without further delay.
After entering the metropolis, Qu is awkwardly silent.
I never thought I, the Kowloong Supreme, couldn't even open a door.
More surprisingly, I thought you, Gray Raven Commandant, were an upstanding individual. I didn't think you could lie through your teeth without batting an eye.

2: You can't exactly label us humans like that so easily.

3: Qu could hear the sarcasm in your voice and wants to retort, but you interrupt her.

2: Helping each other out—that's what partners are for.

3: So that's what a partner is...
She gives you another angry look, but you can tell that she is not really that angry.
I'm not acting like a novice. But as the Supreme, I've always detested deceiving those lesser than me.
Qu ignores you and proceeds to walk further into Kowloong...
